#include<cstdio>
#define MAXX 101
int a[MAXX][MAXX];

int t,m,n,i,j;
int curri, currj, count;
void print()
{
	printf("\n");
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<n;j++)
		{
			printf("%d ",a[i][j]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}	
	printf("\n");
}
int main()
{
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t-- > 0)
	{
		scanf("%d",&m);
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
			}
		}
		count = 0;
		curri = 0;
		currj = 0;

		int flag = 0;
		while(true)
		{
			//print();
			if(flag)
				break;
			if((curri == m-1 && currj == n-1))
			{
				flag = 1;
			}
			else if(curri == m-1)
			{
				if(a[curri][currj+1] != 2147483647)
				{
					a[curri][currj] = a[curri][currj+1];
					a[curri][currj+1] = 2147483647;
					currj++;
					count++;
				}
				else
					flag = 1;
				
			}
			else if(currj == n-1)
			{
				if(a[curri+1][currj] != 2147483647)
				{
					a[curri][currj] = a[curri+1][currj];
					a[curri+1][currj] = 2147483647;
					curri++;
					count++;
				}
				else 
					flag = 1;
			}
			else
			{	
				if(a[curri+1][currj] == 2147483647 && a[curri][currj+1] == 2147483647)
				{
					flag = 1;
				}
				else if(a[curri+1][currj] < a[curri][currj+1] || (a[curri][currj+1] == 2147483647 && a[curri+1][currj] != 2147483647))
				{
					a[curri][currj] = a[curri+1][currj];
					a[curri+1][currj] = 2147483647;
					curri++;
					count++;
				}
				else if(a[curri+1][currj] > a[curri][currj+1] || (a[curri][currj+1] != 2147483647 && a[curri+1][currj] == 2147483647)) 
				{
					a[curri][currj] = a[curri][currj+1];
					a[curri][currj+1] = 2147483647;
					currj++;
					count++;
				}
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
